overview:
## Return Value

An initialized `NSDocument` object.

## Discussion

This initializer (the designated initializer) is invoked by each of the other `NSDocument` initialization methods.

You can override this method to perform initialization that must be done both when creating new empty documents and when opening existing documents. Your override must invoke `super` to initialize private `NSDocument` instance variables. It must never return `nil`. If an error can occur during object initialization, check for the error in an override of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/init(type:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/init(contentsOf:ofType:)], or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/init(for:withContentsOf:ofType:)], because those methods can return `NSError` objects.

# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes and returns an empty document object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init()
```

## Return Value

An initialized `NSDocument` object.

## Discussion

This initializer (the designated initializer) is invoked by each of the other `NSDocument` initialization methods.

You can override this method to perform initialization that must be done both when creating new empty documents and when opening existing documents. Your override must invoke `super` to initialize private `NSDocument` instance variables. It must never return `nil`. If an error can occur during object initialization, check for the error in an override of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/init(type:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/init(contentsOf:ofType:)], or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/init(for:withContentsOf:ofType:)], because those methods can return `NSError` objects.

## Related Documentation

- **Document-Based App Programming Guide for Mac**

## Creating a Document Object

- **init(contentsOf:ofType:)**: Initializes a document located by a URL of a specified type.
- **init(for:withContentsOf:ofType:)**: Initializes a document with the specified contents, and places the resulting document’s file at the designated location.
- **init(type:)**: Initializes a document of a specified type.
